description: Wagglesapp is the first scalable pet industry focused solution, including smart contracts, payments, all in a B2P and P2P global market place. Executing on the Tron Blockchain with excellent TPS, security and governance, Weaver Digital Tokens are in very good company
utility: The Weaver Digital TRC-20 token is the utility token for all Weaver Digital platforms, products and scalable solutions.
top_6_features: Consensus via Delegate Proof of Stake (Fast Paxos)
High bandwidth, averaging 2000 Transactions per Second
Created for maximum utility across all Weaver solutions
Scalability at its core design from inception.
